Alpár Gábos

There are four ways, and only four ways, in which we have contact with the world. We are evaluated and classified by these four contacts: what we do, how we look, what we say, and how we say it.

Programming

I love programming and I like to do it as a craft. I enjoy writing softwares which works as expected, which code is easily readable, which code is well structured, which code is maintainable and which has a lot of automated tests. Therefor I’m a software craftsman type not a hacker.

Life

I believe one person happens only depends on the person itself. I believe that we can create a happy, successful life if we see the world positively, if we react to everything with a constructive mindset and if we understand that life is a school at massive scale.

About

I live in Budapest. I work at Prezi as a software craftsman. I like to learn and teach. I’m a believer of the self development movement.
